title: The Ultimate Guide to Full-Body Workouts
author: Alex Carter

authors.name: Alex Carter
authors.bio: With over a decade of experience in the fitness industry, Alex specializes in strength training and functional fitness. Certified by NASM, he creates programs that balance intensity and long-term sustainability. Alex is passionate about helping people build confidence through mindful movement.

authors.name: Sarah Johnson
authors.bio: Sarah is a certified yoga instructor dedicated to improving flexibility, balance, and mental clarity. With 10,000+ students trained, she blends traditional yoga with modern mobility techniques. Her sessions focus on mindfulness, breath control, and sustainable wellness.

authors.name: Liza Cary
authors.bio: Liza is a professional strength and conditioning coach known for helping athletes build explosive power. As a former national-level lifter, she brings real training experience into her programs. She emphasizes technique, progressive overload, and long-term athletic development.

paragraphs: Discover exercises that target every muscle group, helping you build strength and endurance. Perfect for beginners and seasoned gym-goers alike.

authorBio:
With over a decade of experience in the fitness industry, Alex specializes in strength training and
functional fitness. Certified by NASM and known for his motivational style, Alex designs workout
programs that are both challenging and achievable. His passion lies in helping clients build strength and
confidence through personalized routines. Outside the gym, Alex is an avid runner and enjoys
outdoor adventures.
